item.title: MEXCO ENERGY CORP 10-K
item.description: MEXCO ENERGY CORP, which is in the Crude Petroleum & Natural Gas [1311] industry, SEC 10-K filing on June 27, 2022 had 19683 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: oil - 380 instances gas - 368 instances company - 231 instances reserves - 181 instances 2022 - 179 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here. View the actual filing on the SEC website here
